introduction.p: Priority measures impact on the customer.

guidelines.p: If the priority is not indicated in the bug pattern, here are some guidelines to identify the priority level of a bug:

ul.li: Assign 1 "Blocking" if testing can't proceed until fixed
Assign 2 "High" if the bug needs to be fixed quite urgently
Assign 3 "Medium" if it is a significant problem that should be fixed before shipping
Assign 4 "Low" if it is not hindering to the user and can wait until after a release to be fixed
Assign 5 "Nice to have" if fixing it can wait until there's nothing better to do
